errors.error_description: Incorrectly states Bob requires Node.js and npm installation when it doesn't use JavaScript technologies
correction_candidates: Remove Node.js requirement as Bob is a native IBM i build system
Change to Python and pip installation instructions instead
Replace with Java JDK installation requirements
Update to require Docker and container runtime installation
errors.golden_answer: Remove Node.js requirement as Bob is a native IBM i build system

errors.error_description: Claims Bob requires outdated GNU Make 2.x and is incompatible with modern 4.x versions
correction_candidates: Update to 'GNU Make 4.0 or higher for full compatibility'
Change to 'GNU Make 3.8 or higher' for broader compatibility
Remove GNU Make version requirement entirely
Specify 'GNU Make 4.3 or higher for optimal performance'
errors.golden_answer: Update to 'GNU Make 4.0 or higher for full compatibility'
